The Supervisory Statistician is responsible for providing oversight of professional statisticians, data scientists and management and program analysts working on health care projects. They provide specialized advisory service for the staff of the CART Program, who work on national multi-center projects focused on bio-surveillance, antimicrobial stewardship, and infection control (BASIC). The incumbent will oversee design and develop operational projects and studies for scientists, clinicians and other VA staff and program offices. They will initiate and assist in the development of clinical and health care delivery evaluations.Major Duties include but are not limited to: *  Advises on state-of-the art statistical and epidemiologic theory and methods specific to bio-surveillance, antimicrobial stewardship, and infection control, which could improve the accuracy and/or decrease the costs of the studies.
